name: truPropulsion

screenshots.caption: truPropulsion being used in upcoming mobile game

short_description: A physics game engine with emphasis on accuracy, precision, and reality, specifically for mobile devices. Environmental and object manipulations and interactions in space-themed environments such as those that rely on gravity and angular momentum are fast, smooth, and fluid utilizing and managing the efficient use of mobile system resources and memory.
summary: Mobile 2D, 3D Physics Game Engine for Space-themed Environments
